_isHealthy(address,address,address,uint2.custom:security: This function should be called before allowing new borrows
_isHealthy(address,address,address,uint2.details: Checks if a lending position is healthy based on various parameters

params.borrowToken: Address of the token being borrowed
params.factory: Address of the lending pool factory
params.totalBorrowAssets: Total assets borrowed across all positions

checkLiquidation(address,address,address.details: Checks if a position is liquidatable

params.borrowToken: Address of the token being borrowed
params.factory: Address of the lending pool factory
params.totalBorrowAssets: Total assets borrowed across all positions

returns.borrowValue: The current borrow value in USD
returns.collateralValue: The current collateral value in USD
returns.isLiquidatable: Whether the position can be liquidated

params.borrower: The address of the borrower to liquidate
params.lendingPoolRouter: The address of the lending pool router
params.liquidationIncentive: The liquidation incentive in basis points

liquidateByMEV(address,address,address,u.details: Liquidates a position using MEV (external liquidator buys collateral)

params.borrower: The address of the borrower to liquidate
params.lendingPoolRouter: The address of the lending pool router
params.liquidationIncentive: The liquidation incentive in basis points
params.repayAmount: Amount of debt the liquidator wants to repay

liquidator().details: Returns the address of the liquidator contract

returns._0: The address of the liquidator contract

_isHealthy(address,address,address,uint2.notice: This function validates if a position meets health requirements
